2#define OT_GLYF_GLYPH_HH

8#include "SimpleGlyph.hh"
9#include "CompositeGlyph.hh"

11#include "coord-setter.hh"

14namespace OT {
15
16struct glyf_accelerator_t;
17
18namespace glyf_impl {
19
20
21enum phantom_point_index_t
22{
23 PHANTOM_LEFT = 0,
24 PHANTOM_RIGHT = 1,
25 PHANTOM_TOP = 2,
26 PHANTOM_BOTTOM = 3,
27 PHANTOM_COUNT = 4
28};
29
30struct Glyph
31{
32 enum glyph_type_t { EMPTY, SIMPLE, COMPOSITE, VAR_COMPOSITE };
33
34 public:
35 composite_iter_t get_composite_iterator () const
36 {
37 if (type != COMPOSITE) return composite_iter_t ();
38 return CompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).iter ();
39 }
40 var_composite_iter_t get_var_composite_iterator () const
41 {
42 if (type != VAR_COMPOSITE) return var_composite_iter_t ();
43 return VarCompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).iter ();
44 }
45
46 const hb_bytes_t trim_padding () const
47 {
48 switch (type) {
49 case COMPOSITE: return CompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).trim_padding ();
50 case SIMPLE: return SimpleGlyph (*header, bytes).trim_padding ();
51 default: return bytes;
52 }
53 }
54
55 void drop_hints ()
56 {
57 switch (type) {
58 case COMPOSITE: CompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).drop_hints (); return;
59 case SIMPLE: SimpleGlyph (*header, bytes).drop_hints (); return;
60 default: return;
61 }
62 }
63
64 void set_overlaps_flag ()
65 {
66 switch (type) {
67 case COMPOSITE: CompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).set_overlaps_flag (); return;
68 case SIMPLE: SimpleGlyph (*header, bytes).set_overlaps_flag (); return;
69 default: return;
70 }
71 }
72
73 void drop_hints_bytes (hb_bytes_t &dest_start, hb_bytes_t &dest_end) const
74 {
75 switch (type) {
76 case COMPOSITE: CompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).drop_hints_bytes (dest_start); return;
77 case SIMPLE: SimpleGlyph (*header, bytes).drop_hints_bytes (dest_start, dest_end); return;
78 default: return;
79 }
80 }
81
82 void update_mtx (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan,
83 int xMin, int xMax,
84 int yMin, int yMax,
85 const contour_point_vector_t &all_points) const
86 {
87 hb_codepoint_t new_gid = 0;
88 if (!plan->new_gid_for_old_gid (old_gid: gid, new_gid: &new_gid))
89 return;
90
91 if (type != EMPTY)
92 {
93 plan->bounds_width_map.set (key: new_gid, value: xMax - xMin);
94 plan->bounds_height_map.set (key: new_gid, value: yMax - yMin);
95 }
96
97 unsigned len = all_points.length;
98 float leftSideX = all_points[len - 4].x;
99 float rightSideX = all_points[len - 3].x;
100 float topSideY = all_points[len - 2].y;
101 float bottomSideY = all_points[len - 1].y;
102
103 signed hori_aw = roundf (rightSideX - leftSideX);
104 if (hori_aw < 0) hori_aw = 0;
105 int lsb = roundf (xMin - leftSideX);
106 plan->hmtx_map.set (key: new_gid, value: hb_pair (a: (unsigned) hori_aw, b&: lsb));
107 //flag value should be computed using non-empty glyphs
108 if (type != EMPTY && lsb != xMin)
109 plan->head_maxp_info.allXMinIsLsb = false;
110
111 signed vert_aw = roundf (topSideY - bottomSideY);
112 if (vert_aw < 0) vert_aw = 0;
113 int tsb = roundf (topSideY - yMax);
114 plan->vmtx_map.set (key: new_gid, value: hb_pair (a: (unsigned) vert_aw, b&: tsb));
115 }
116
117 bool compile_header_bytes (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan,
118 const contour_point_vector_t &all_points,
119 hb_bytes_t &dest_bytes /* OUT */) const
120 {
121 GlyphHeader *glyph_header = nullptr;
122 if (!plan->pinned_at_default && type != EMPTY && all_points.length >= 4)
123 {
124 glyph_header = (GlyphHeader *) hb_calloc (nmemb: 1, size: GlyphHeader::static_size);
125 if (unlikely (!glyph_header)) return false;
126 }
127
128 float xMin = 0, xMax = 0;
129 float yMin = 0, yMax = 0;
130 if (all_points.length > 4)
131 {
132 xMin = xMax = all_points[0].x;
133 yMin = yMax = all_points[0].y;
134 }
135
136 for (unsigned i = 1; i < all_points.length - 4; i++)
137 {
138 float x = all_points[i].x;
139 float y = all_points[i].y;
140 xMin = hb_min (xMin, x);
141 xMax = hb_max (xMax, x);
142 yMin = hb_min (yMin, y);
143 yMax = hb_max (yMax, y);
144 }
145
146 update_mtx (plan, roundf (xMin), roundf (xMax), roundf (yMin), roundf (yMax), all_points);
147
148 int rounded_xMin = roundf (xMin);
149 int rounded_xMax = roundf (xMax);
150 int rounded_yMin = roundf (yMin);
151 int rounded_yMax = roundf (yMax);
152
153 if (type != EMPTY)
154 {
155 plan->head_maxp_info.xMin = hb_min (plan->head_maxp_info.xMin, rounded_xMin);
156 plan->head_maxp_info.yMin = hb_min (plan->head_maxp_info.yMin, rounded_yMin);
157 plan->head_maxp_info.xMax = hb_max (plan->head_maxp_info.xMax, rounded_xMax);
158 plan->head_maxp_info.yMax = hb_max (plan->head_maxp_info.yMax, rounded_yMax);
159 }
160
161 /* when pinned at default, no need to compile glyph header
162 * and for empty glyphs: all_points only include phantom points.
163 * just update metrics and then return */
164 if (!glyph_header)
165 return true;
166
167 glyph_header->numberOfContours = header->numberOfContours;
168
169 glyph_header->xMin = rounded_xMin;
170 glyph_header->yMin = rounded_yMin;
171 glyph_header->xMax = rounded_xMax;
172 glyph_header->yMax = rounded_yMax;
173
174 dest_bytes = hb_bytes_t ((const char *)glyph_header, GlyphHeader::static_size);
175 return true;
176 }
177
178 bool compile_bytes_with_deltas (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan,
179 hb_font_t *font,
180 const glyf_accelerator_t &glyf,
181 hb_bytes_t &dest_start, /* IN/OUT */
182 hb_bytes_t &dest_end /* OUT */)
183 {
184 contour_point_vector_t all_points, deltas;
185 unsigned composite_contours = 0;
186 head_maxp_info_t *head_maxp_info_p = &plan->head_maxp_info;
187 unsigned *composite_contours_p = &composite_contours;
188
189 // don't compute head/maxp values when glyph has no contours(type is EMPTY)
190 // also ignore .notdef glyph when --notdef-outline is not enabled
191 if (type == EMPTY ||
192 (gid == 0 && !(plan->flags & HB_SUBSET_FLAGS_NOTDEF_OUTLINE)))
193 {
194 head_maxp_info_p = nullptr;
195 composite_contours_p = nullptr;
196 }
197
198 if (!get_points (font, glyf_accelerator: glyf, all_points, deltas: &deltas, head_maxp_info: head_maxp_info_p, composite_contours: composite_contours_p, shift_points_hori: false, use_my_metrics: false))
199 return false;
200
201 // .notdef, set type to empty so we only update metrics and don't compile bytes for
202 // it
203 if (gid == 0 &&
204 !(plan->flags & HB_SUBSET_FLAGS_NOTDEF_OUTLINE))
205 {
206 type = EMPTY;
207 dest_start = hb_bytes_t ();
208 dest_end = hb_bytes_t ();
209 }
210
211 //dont compile bytes when pinned at default, just recalculate bounds
212 if (!plan->pinned_at_default) {
213 switch (type) {
214 case COMPOSITE:
215 if (!CompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).compile_bytes_with_deltas (source_bytes: dest_start,
216 deltas,
217 dest_bytes&: dest_end))
218 return false;
219 break;
220 case SIMPLE:
221 if (!SimpleGlyph (*header, bytes).compile_bytes_with_deltas (all_points,
222 no_hinting: plan->flags & HB_SUBSET_FLAGS_NO_HINTING,
223 dest_bytes&: dest_end))
224 return false;
225 break;
226 default:
227 /* set empty bytes for empty glyph
228 * do not use source glyph's pointers */
229 dest_start = hb_bytes_t ();
230 dest_end = hb_bytes_t ();
231 break;
232 }
233 }
234
235 if (!compile_header_bytes (plan, all_points, dest_bytes&: dest_start))
236 {
237 dest_end.fini ();
238 return false;
239 }
240 return true;
241 }
242
243
244 /* Note: Recursively calls itself.
245 * all_points includes phantom points
246 */
247 template <typename accelerator_t>
248 bool get_points (hb_font_t *font, const accelerator_t &glyf_accelerator,
249 contour_point_vector_t &all_points /* OUT */,
250 contour_point_vector_t *deltas = nullptr, /* OUT */
251 head_maxp_info_t * head_maxp_info = nullptr, /* OUT */
252 unsigned *composite_contours = nullptr, /* OUT */
253 bool shift_points_hori = true,
254 bool use_my_metrics = true,
255 bool phantom_only = false,
256 hb_array_t<int> coords = hb_array_t<int> (),
257 unsigned int depth = 0,
258 unsigned *edge_count = nullptr) const
259 {
260 if (unlikely (depth > HB_MAX_NESTING_LEVEL)) return false;
261 unsigned stack_edge_count = 0;
262 if (!edge_count) edge_count = &stack_edge_count;
263 if (unlikely (*edge_count > HB_GLYF_MAX_EDGE_COUNT)) return false;
264 (*edge_count)++;
265
266 if (head_maxp_info)
267 {
268 head_maxp_info->maxComponentDepth = hb_max (head_maxp_info->maxComponentDepth, depth);
269 }
270
271 if (!coords)
272 coords = hb_array (array: font->coords, length: font->num_coords);
273
274 contour_point_vector_t stack_points;
275 bool inplace = type == SIMPLE && all_points.length == 0;
276 /* Load into all_points if it's empty, as an optimization. */
277 contour_point_vector_t &points = inplace ? all_points : stack_points;
278
279 switch (type) {
280 case SIMPLE:
281 if (depth == 0 && head_maxp_info)
282 head_maxp_info->maxContours = hb_max (head_maxp_info->maxContours, (unsigned) header->numberOfContours);
283 if (depth > 0 && composite_contours)
284 *composite_contours += (unsigned) header->numberOfContours;
285 if (unlikely (!SimpleGlyph (*header, bytes).get_contour_points (points, phantom_only)))
286 return false;
287 break;
288 case COMPOSITE:
289 {
290 /* pseudo component points for each component in composite glyph */
291 unsigned num_points = hb_len (CompositeGlyph (*header, bytes).iter ());
292 if (unlikely (!points.resize (num_points))) return false;
293 break;
294 }
295#ifndef HB_NO_VAR_COMPOSITES
296 case VAR_COMPOSITE:
297 {
298 for (auto &item : get_var_composite_iterator ())
299 if (unlikely (!item.get_points (points))) return false;
300 }
301#endif
302 default:
303 break;
304 }
305
306 /* Init phantom points */
307 if (unlikely (!points.resize (points.length + PHANTOM_COUNT))) return false;
308 hb_array_t<contour_point_t> phantoms = points.as_array ().sub_array (start_offset: points.length - PHANTOM_COUNT, seg_count: PHANTOM_COUNT);
309 {
310 int lsb = 0;
311 int h_delta = glyf_accelerator.hmtx->get_leading_bearing_without_var_unscaled (gid, &lsb) ?
312 (int) header->xMin - lsb : 0;
313 HB_UNUSED int tsb = 0;
314 int v_orig = (int) header->yMax +
315#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
316 ((void) glyf_accelerator.vmtx->get_leading_bearing_without_var_unscaled (gid, &tsb), tsb)
317#else
318 0
319#endif
320 ;
321 unsigned h_adv = glyf_accelerator.hmtx->get_advance_without_var_unscaled (gid);
322 unsigned v_adv =
323#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
324 glyf_accelerator.vmtx->get_advance_without_var_unscaled (gid)
325#else
326 - font->face->get_upem ()
327#endif
328 ;
329 phantoms[PHANTOM_LEFT].x = h_delta;
330 phantoms[PHANTOM_RIGHT].x = h_adv + h_delta;
331 phantoms[PHANTOM_TOP].y = v_orig;
332 phantoms[PHANTOM_BOTTOM].y = v_orig - (int) v_adv;
333 }
334
335 if (deltas != nullptr && depth == 0 && type == COMPOSITE)
336 {
337 if (unlikely (!deltas->resize (points.length))) return false;
338 deltas->copy_vector (other: points);
339 }
340
341#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
342 glyf_accelerator.gvar->apply_deltas_to_points (gid,
343 coords,
344 points.as_array ());
345#endif
346
347 // mainly used by CompositeGlyph calculating new X/Y offset value so no need to extend it
348 // with child glyphs' points
349 if (deltas != nullptr && depth == 0 && type == COMPOSITE)
350 {
351 for (unsigned i = 0 ; i < points.length; i++)
352 {
353 deltas->arrayZ[i].x = points.arrayZ[i].x - deltas->arrayZ[i].x;
354 deltas->arrayZ[i].y = points.arrayZ[i].y - deltas->arrayZ[i].y;
355 }
356 }
357
358 switch (type) {
359 case SIMPLE:
360 if (depth == 0 && head_maxp_info)
361 head_maxp_info->maxPoints = hb_max (head_maxp_info->maxPoints, points.length - 4);
362 if (!inplace)
363 all_points.extend (a: points.as_array ());
364 break;
365 case COMPOSITE:
366 {
367 contour_point_vector_t comp_points;
368 unsigned int comp_index = 0;
369 for (auto &item : get_composite_iterator ())
370 {
371 comp_points.reset ();
372 if (unlikely (!glyf_accelerator.glyph_for_gid (item.get_gid ())
373 .get_points (font,
374 glyf_accelerator,
375 comp_points,
376 deltas,
377 head_maxp_info,
378 composite_contours,
379 shift_points_hori,
380 use_my_metrics,
381 phantom_only,
382 coords,
383 depth + 1,
384 edge_count)))
385 return false;
386
387 /* Copy phantom points from component if USE_MY_METRICS flag set */
388 if (use_my_metrics && item.is_use_my_metrics ())
389 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < PHANTOM_COUNT; i++)
390 phantoms[i] = comp_points[comp_points.length - PHANTOM_COUNT + i];
391
392 /* Apply component transformation & translation */
393 item.transform_points (points&: comp_points);
394
395 /* Apply translation from gvar */
396 comp_points.translate (delta: points[comp_index]);
397
398 if (item.is_anchored ())
399 {
400 unsigned int p1, p2;
401 item.get_anchor_points (point1&: p1, point2&: p2);
402 if (likely (p1 < all_points.length && p2 < comp_points.length))
403 {
404 contour_point_t delta;
405 delta.init (x_: all_points[p1].x - comp_points[p2].x,
406 y_: all_points[p1].y - comp_points[p2].y);
407
408 comp_points.translate (delta);
409 }
410 }
411
412 all_points.extend (a: comp_points.as_array ().sub_array (start_offset: 0, seg_count: comp_points.length - PHANTOM_COUNT));
413
414 if (all_points.length > HB_GLYF_MAX_POINTS)
415 return false;
416
417 comp_index++;
418 }
419
420 if (head_maxp_info && depth == 0)
421 {
422 if (composite_contours)
423 head_maxp_info->maxCompositeContours = hb_max (head_maxp_info->maxCompositeContours, *composite_contours);
424 head_maxp_info->maxCompositePoints = hb_max (head_maxp_info->maxCompositePoints, all_points.length);
425 head_maxp_info->maxComponentElements = hb_max (head_maxp_info->maxComponentElements, comp_index);
426 }
427 all_points.extend (a: phantoms);
428 } break;
429#ifndef HB_NO_VAR_COMPOSITES
430 case VAR_COMPOSITE:
431 {
432 contour_point_vector_t comp_points;
433 hb_array_t<contour_point_t> points_left = points.as_array ();
434 for (auto &item : get_var_composite_iterator ())
435 {
436 hb_array_t<contour_point_t> record_points = points_left.sub_array (0, item.get_num_points ());
437
438 comp_points.reset ();
439
440 auto component_coords = coords;
441 if (item.is_reset_unspecified_axes ())
442 component_coords = hb_array<int> ();
443
444 coord_setter_t coord_setter (component_coords);
445 item.set_variations (coord_setter, record_points);
446
447 if (unlikely (!glyf_accelerator.glyph_for_gid (item.get_gid ())
448 .get_points (font,
449 glyf_accelerator,
450 comp_points,
451 deltas,
452 head_maxp_info,
453 nullptr,
454 shift_points_hori,
455 use_my_metrics,
456 phantom_only,
457 coord_setter.get_coords (),
458 depth + 1,
459 edge_count)))
460 return false;
461
462 /* Apply component transformation */
463 item.transform_points (record_points, comp_points);
464
465 /* Copy phantom points from component if USE_MY_METRICS flag set */
466 if (use_my_metrics && item.is_use_my_metrics ())
467 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < PHANTOM_COUNT; i++)
468 phantoms[i] = comp_points[comp_points.length - PHANTOM_COUNT + i];
469
470 all_points.extend (comp_points.as_array ().sub_array (0, comp_points.length - PHANTOM_COUNT));
471
472 if (all_points.length > HB_GLYF_MAX_POINTS)
473 return false;
474
475 points_left += item.get_num_points ();
476 }
477 all_points.extend (phantoms);
478 } break;
479#endif
480 default:
481 all_points.extend (a: phantoms);
482 break;
483 }
484
485 if (depth == 0 && shift_points_hori) /* Apply at top level */
486 {
487 /* Undocumented rasterizer behavior:
488 * Shift points horizontally by the updated left side bearing
489 */
490 contour_point_t delta;
491 delta.init (x_: -phantoms[PHANTOM_LEFT].x, y_: 0.f);
492 if (delta.x) all_points.translate (delta);
493 }
494
495 return !all_points.in_error ();
496 }
497
498 bool get_extents_without_var_scaled (hb_font_t *font, const glyf_accelerator_t &glyf_accelerator,
499 hb_glyph_extents_t *extents) const
500 {
501 if (type == EMPTY) return true; /* Empty glyph; zero extents. */
502 return header->get_extents_without_var_scaled (font, glyf_accelerator, gid, extents);
503 }
504
505 hb_bytes_t get_bytes () const { return bytes; }
506
507 Glyph () : bytes (),
508 header (bytes.as<GlyphHeader> ()),
509 gid (-1),
510 type(EMPTY)
511 {}
512
513 Glyph (hb_bytes_t bytes_,
514 hb_codepoint_t gid_ = (unsigned) -1) : bytes (bytes_),
515 header (bytes.as<GlyphHeader> ()),
516 gid (gid_)
517 {
518 int num_contours = header->numberOfContours;
519 if (unlikely (num_contours == 0)) type = EMPTY;
520 else if (num_contours > 0) type = SIMPLE;
521 else if (num_contours == -2) type = VAR_COMPOSITE;
522 else type = COMPOSITE; /* negative numbers */
523 }
524
525 protected:
526 hb_bytes_t bytes;
527 const GlyphHeader *header;
528 hb_codepoint_t gid;
529 unsigned type;
530};
531
532
533} /* namespace glyf_impl */
534} /* namespace OT */

537#endif /* OT_GLYF_GLYPH_HH */
